title: The Sky is Crying
lyrics:
[Chorus]
The sky is crying
Look at the tears roll down the street
I said, the sky is crying
Look at the tears roll down the street
I'm waiting in tears, baby
Looking for my baby
And I wonder, wonder where can she be
[Verse 1]
I saw my baby one morning
He was walking on down the street
Saw my baby, saw my baby one morning
He was walking on down, on down the street
Make me feel so good
'Til my poor heart would skip a beat
[Verse 2]
Now listen
I've got a bad, bad feeling
My baby, my baby, don't want me no more
I've got bad, bad, bad feeling
My baby don't, don't want me no more
Now the sky's been crying
The tears rolling out my door

[Scatting]
[Verse 3]
Now listen
I've got a bad, bad feeling
My baby don't, baby want me no more
I've got bad, bad, bad, bad feeling
My baby don't, my baby don't want me no more
Now the sky's been crying
And the tears rolling out my door
[Outro]
Oh yeah
